channel.title: How to change the color of a bar. [eg. Runite, Iron]
channel.description:
I want to make a dragon bar, but I don't want to erase any existing bars.
And I can't find "2363" in my class8.java.
Any suggestions?

item.description:

Thats what I meant O_o ^^^^

item.title: How to change the color of a bar. [eg. Runite, Iron]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

DivineSouls:

Use your imagination and pretend it’s red? Lol, I don’t think so.

how about making a new config in class 8 and just take the existing bar model and turning it red… much easier.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the color of a bar. [eg. Runite, Iron]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Well, you can take a runite bar and you can change the color of it in datmaker to red. Create a new model number. Add it to class8.java

Some links that might help you through the process:

Datmaker - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340744.0.html

Tutorial on making new models - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

Read full topic
